header.title: Admin Dashboard
header.subtitle: Manage schools, review evidence, and monitor program progress

welcomeBanner.title: Lucky You!
welcomeBanner.greeting: Welcome to the Plastic Clever Schools admin team!
welcomeBanner.description: You now have full access to manage the program, review evidence submissions, publish case studies, and help schools on their journey to reduce plastic waste.

export.title: Export Data
export.description: Choose format and data to export:

failed.title: Export Failed
failed.description: Failed to export data. Please try again.

invitePartner.title: Invite New Partner
invitePartner.description: Partners have admin-like access but cannot assign roles or download school data.

deleteUser.title: Delete User
deleteUser.description: Choose how to handle the user's content and data

bulkDelete.title: Bulk Delete {{count}} User{{plural}}
bulkDelete.description: Choose how to handle the selected users' content and data

changeRole.title: Change User Role
changeRole.description: Update the role and permissions for {{name}}

deletionPreview.title: Deletion Preview
deletionPreview.description: This user has the following data:

labels.roleDescription: Select the user's role and permissions

soft.label: Soft Delete (Recommended)
soft.description: Users will be hidden from the system but all data is preserved. Can be restored later.

transfer.label: Transfer Ownership
transfer.description: Transfer all content to "Archived User" system account, then delete the user. Historical data is preserved.
transfer.bulkDescription: Transfer all content to "Archived User" system account, then delete the users. Historical data is preserved.

hard.label: Hard Delete (Permanent)
hard.description: WARNING: Permanently delete user AND all their content. This cannot be undone!
hard.bulkDescription: WARNING: Permanently delete users AND all their content. This cannot be undone!

school.label: School (Head Teacher)
school.description: Head teacher role with school management permissions

partner.label: Partner
partner.description: Admin-like access but cannot assign roles or download school data

admin.label: Admin
admin.description: Full platform access including role assignment and data downloads

invitationSent.title: Invitation Sent
invitationSent.adminDescription: Admin invitation has been sent successfully.
invitationSent.partnerDescription: Partner invitation has been sent successfully.

userDeleted.hardDeleted: The user has been successfully permanently deleted.

updateFailed.description: Failed to update user role. Please try again.

helpText.aiAutoFillTooltip: AI analyzes your uploaded file and automatically suggests a title, description, stage, theme, age range, and resource type based on the file content and name.
helpText.aiAutoFillDescription: Let AI analyze your file and suggest metadata to save time. You can review and adjust the suggestions before saving.

dataImport.title: Import Data from WordPress
dataImport.subtitle: Import schools, users, and their relationships from CSV or Excel files exported from your WordPress database

important.title: Important:
important.description: Prepare three separate files (CSV or Excel format):
important.schools: Schools - Contains school information (name, country, type, etc.)
important.users: Users - Contains teacher/user information (email, name, etc.)
important.relationships: Relationships - Links users to schools with their roles
important.templateNote: Download the templates below to see the required column format.
important.note: Download the templates below to see the required column format.

descriptions.schools: Upload a CSV or Excel file containing school data
descriptions.users: Upload a CSV or Excel file containing user/teacher data
